flawed_nl_solution:
Santana has 1 + 1 + 2 = <<1+1+2=4>>4 brothers with birthdays in the second half of the year.
She has 7 brothers - 4 brothers = <<7-4=3>>3 brothers with birthdays in the first half of the year.
Altogether, she has to buy 4 + 7 = <<4+7=8>>8 presents in the second half of the year.
Therefore, she has to buy 8 - 3 = <<8-3=5>>5 more presents in the second half of the year.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 11, not 8. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
